Package com.blakfx.helix

Class HelixModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.blakfx.helix.HelixModule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HelixCryptoProvider
    public class HelixModule
extends Object
implements HelixCryptoProvider
    Acts as a facilitator between the Chat client and the Helix server. Revolves around two primary objectives: encrypt and decrypt content. Helix itself is not aware of the business logic of your application to do its job, nor should it. The module is what allows the integration of Helix to your application to be seamless.

      Indicates a non-fatal Helix decryption error.

      Indicates a non-fatal Helix encryption error.
      static class  HelixModule.HelixException
      Indicates a fatal Helix error.
      static class  HelixModule.InvalidTargetException
      Indicates a non-fatal invalid Helix target error.

      • encrypt

        public final byte[] encrypt​(byte[] plainData,
                            String aRecipientAccountID,
                            long messageID)
                     throws HelixModule.HelixException
        Encrypt a plaintext string intended for a target username. Allows any application an abstract way of using Helix to encrypt a plaintext string. Application can decide how to supply it, and what to do with the result.
        Specified by:
        encrypt in interface HelixCryptoProvider
        Parameters:
        plainData - The plaintext content to encrypt
        aRecipientAccountID - The account of the recipient on the Helix server to receive this content
        messageID - The messageID for this specific communication
        Returns:
        Encrypted byte contents as a string
        Throws:
        HelixModule.HelixException - Not connected to the Helix server
        HelixModule.InvalidTargetException - Invalid target specified
        HelixModule.EncryptionException - Encryption failed to complete successfully

      • decrypt

        public final byte[] decrypt​(byte[] encryptedData,
                            long messageID)
        Decrypts a string blob associated to a specific contact. Allows any application an abstract way of using Helix to decrypt a plaintext string. Application can decide how to supply it, and what to do with the result.
        Specified by:
        decrypt in interface HelixCryptoProvider
        Parameters:
        encryptedData - Contains the encrypted bytes to decrypt
        messageID - The messageID associated with this blob
        Returns:
        The content as a plaintext decrypted string
